title: Opaque and Foliage Material Presets
description: Material Presets for Quick Use with Foliage and Opaque Textures, Featuring High Levels of Customization and Easy Readability.
longDescription:
This pack includes simple and easy to use master materials aimed to be used by beginners to the unreal texturing system; these master materials allow easy creation of versatile instances with a great degree of artistic control in brightness, roughness, spectacular, subsurface scattering and more.

The primary use of this pack is with texture assets created through PBR scans, such as those from Megascans or Muravision. Do keep in mind, this back is not designed for experienced users. It is built around ease of access for those new to the unreal development system who want a quick and easy way to apply texture to material without the hassle of creating your own masters.

Refer to documentation linked below for more information on how to use with ease.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Quick and Easy to use Material presets perfect for use with PBR scans.
  •  Several example material instances made with PBR scan textures allowing the user to work backwards without documentation.
  •  In-Depth documentation giving an in depth tutorial for usage.

Texture Resolutions:

  •  4k textures for:
  • (Dirt_Groundcover_01)
  • (Boston_Fern_01)
  • (Sandy_Clay_Brick_01)
  • (Uneven_Grass_Groundcover_01)
  •  2k
  • (Animal_Flesh_01)

Number of Materials: 7

Do Materials derive from a Master Material with instances as variation: Yes

Number of Textures: 5

Supported Development Platforms: (PC, Console, Untested for Mobile)

Supported Target Build Platforms: (PC)

Documentation: (https://www.dropbox.com/s/egzlpurltkjb5wr/MatDocumentaion.pdf?dl=0)
